definitions.definition: The appearance of ripples or bumps on a dirt or gravel road , caused by wear from traffic , erosion , or poor grading .
A streaky appearance on solid patches of color printed on corrugated materials, resulting from the uneven pressure exerted due to corrugations .
An unexplained behavior in which bees move across the surface of their hive with a rocking motion.

main_definition: The appearance of ripples or bumps on a dirt or gravel road , caused by wear from traffic , erosion , or poor grading .
secondary_definitions: A streaky appearance on solid patches of color printed on corrugated materials, resulting from the uneven pressure exerted due to corrugations .
( bees ) An unexplained behavior in which bees move across the surface of their hive with a rocking motion.
